text:
(light music)
For any business,
innovation can't happen without security,
but that security can sometimes feel cumbersome.
That's why from day one,
AWS has made security their top priority,
and no matter the size or type of your organization,
they can help you move quickly, securely,
and with confidence to enable your business.
AWS is architected to be
the most secure cloud computing environment available today.
All AWS services are designed
to protect your cloud environment,
enabling you to innovate quickly and securely.
In fact, customers say the security of their apps
and data on AWS is materially better than
on their own on-premisis infrastructure.
Get the level of protection you need by accessing more than
300 security, compliance and governance services
and features, as well as thousands more security solutions
in the AWS marketplace.
Your builders can move fast, writing code
and improving security posture at the same time,
and AWS security automation helps ensure your teams spend
their time on the highest value tasks.
Use proven security from AWS
and accelerate your innovation today.
(light music)
